q_en: What materials were used in Olivia's order?
gt:
Hey there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the materials used in Olivia's order. Here's what we found:

| Material ID | Material Name               |
|-------------|-----------------------------|
| 8           | Leather Pieces              |
| 12          | Denim Fabric Pieces         |
| 6           | Silk Pieces                 |
| 4           | Wool Pieces                 |
| 10          | Synthetic Fiber Pieces      |
| 2           | Fabric Pieces               |

These are the materials that were part of Olivia's order. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! üòä

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Olivia';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the orders placed by the customer "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN ('7');
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the orders associated with "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN ('25', '26', '27');
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs from the order_product records

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.name FROM product_material pm JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.id WHERE pm.product_id IN ('18', '17', '10');
steps.description: Retrieve the material IDs and names used in the products associated with "Olivia's" orders
